recommended.title: To pick a VPN provider, we recommend the following independent sources to make your choice:

tips.title: Some things to keep in mind:

list.title: If you use a VPN, your internet traffic goes through the provider’s network. Whoever is in control of the servers can see and log anything you do online, if they choose to.
Don't use free VPNs: your browsing data is the product that is being sold.
Most 'Best VPN' lists and websites are compiled to maximize affiliate revenue, not to find the best service (with rare exceptions).

recommendations.title: Based on your choice, running your own VPN server might be a better solution if you don’t want to trust a commercial VPN service with your data.

recommended.title: If you still plan to pick a VPN provider, we recommend the following independent sources to make your choice:

recommendations.title: Based on your choices, using a VPN service is not suitable for your needs. We recommend ignoring the advice of VPN providers who might tell you otherwise.
